Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Request Input Database schema PostgreSQL sample data for order_event_log orders and resources and a defined Assumed Normal Process Flow Task Identify anomalies and undesirable behaviors hypothesize reasons propose SQL queries Constraint no hints Goal comprehensive analysis report

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the Data vs Normal Process Flow Normal Flow 1 Register Order 2 Perform Credit Check 3 Validate Stock 4 Confirm Shipment 5 Ship Goods 6 Issue Invoice 7 Receive Payment Case 1001 follows normal flow Case 1002 Register Order then Confirm Shipment anomaly out of order Ship Goods anomaly Perform Credit Check late Validate Stock late Case 1003 Register Order Perform Credit Check Ship Goods anomaly skipping steps Issue Invoice Confirm Shipment after shipping anomaly Case 1004 Register Order Receive Payment anomaly before credit invoice Issue Invoice after payment Confirm Shipment shipment_scheduled N Ship Goods missing credit stock validation

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Identify Anomalies Anomalies Sequence Violations out-of-order activities Cases 1002 1003 1004 Missing Activities Case 1003 no Validate Stock Case 1004 no Credit Check no Stock Logical Inconsistencies Ship before Confirm Payment before Invoice Financial Control Risks shipping before credit

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Hypotheses for Anomalies Anomaly 1 Sequence Violations Hypothesis emergency overrides system bypasses manual errors Anomaly 2 Missing Activities Hypothesis priority status trusted customers negligence Anomaly 3 Logical Inconsistencies Hypothesis data entry errors status mismatches Anomaly 4 Financial Risks Hypothesis fraud cash flow manipulation prepayments

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Draft SQL Queries Query 1 Sequence Violation Detection compare timestamps activity pairs Query 2 Missing Steps count expected activities per case Query 3 Resource Department Analysis join resources find violators Query 4 Order Type Correlation join orders priority skips

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Refine Output Structure Introduction Section 1 Anomalies Section 2 Hypotheses Section 3 SQL Queries Conclusion

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Self-Correction Review Check table names correct Check column names correct Check SQL PostgreSQL syntax yes Check no hints yes Check joins resource resource_id correct
